Room.Name: Nartiz Tor
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the southern section of Brownhaven. 50.n0.e0.s1.w0
Room.LongDescription: A rocky tor, part of the Nartiz Mountain Range, juts north toward the village of Brownhaven. You will have to climb higher to stay above the hot, sharp rocks you see below. Not much vegetation down there, and you see very little animal life. To the east however, you can see the great Kista Forest, which is south of the beautiful city of Kista.
